translate.english: on the road / on the way

examples.example: 我在上学的路上欢快地哼着歌，心情十分美好。

translate.english: I humming merrily on the way to school and feeling very good.

examples.example: 我在下班回家的路上，欣赏着沿途的美景，感到惬意极了。

translate.english: I am on the way home from work, enjoying the beautiful scenery along the way and feeling extremely comfortable.

examples.example: 我走在回家的路上，看到夕阳西下，美景如画，心中满是欢喜。

translate.english: I was walking on the way home and saw the setting sun, the beautiful scenery was like a painting, and my heart was full of joy.
